goal.ch:
“1. 基礎大氣化學
2. 空氣汙染概論
3. 溫室氣體“
goal.en:
“1. Fundamental atmospheric chemistry
2. Overview of air pollution
3. Greenhouse gases“

outline.ch:
“1. 平流層化學反應
2. 對流層光化學與汙染
3. 溫室效應“
outline.en:
“1. Stratospheric chemical reactions
2. Tropospheric photochemical reactions and pollution
3. Greenhouse effect“

textbook.ch: 環境化學 (作者: Colin Baird and Michael Cann) 4th Ed.
textbook.en:
“Environmental Chemistry by Colin Baird and Michael Cann
4th Edition“

domain.ch:
基礎學科


、


環境分析


、


化學通識
domain.en:
基礎學科


、


環境分析


、


化學通識

ch.competencies: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en.competencies: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.

ch: 系所:限化學學系碩士班、化學學系博士班。
系所:限化學學系。年級:限二年級、三年級、四年級。
en: Department:MSc in Chemistry、PhD in Chemistry only.
Department:Department of Chemistry only.Year:Second Year、Third Year、Fourth Year only.
